string.text: 6h4 Bayonet

A multi-purpose bayonet designed for mounting on rifles, featuring a sharp blade, a serrated edge, and a wire-cutting capability when paired with its scabbard. Its durable construction and versatility make it an essential tool for soldiers, useful in combat, survival, and utility tasks.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]30
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]52
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]10
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: NO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]25% - 40%
NR-40 Scout Knife

A classic military knife originally designed for scouts and special forces, featuring a distinctive curved blade and a durable wooden or synthetic handle. Known for its balance and cutting power, it remains a favored close-combat and utility weapon.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]18
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: NO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]35% - 50%
Hunting Knife

A versatile fixed-blade knife designed for skinning, cutting, and general outdoor survival tasks. Its sturdy construction and ergonomic handle make it an essential tool for hunters and outdoor enthusiasts.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Cuts Thick Mutant Skin?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]45% - 60%
Spetsnaz Switchblade

A compact, automatic knife designed for rapid deployment and close-quarters engagements. Its spring-assisted mechanism allows for quick access, making it an effective tool for special forces and covert operations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]55% - 70%
M9 Bayonet

A multi-purpose military bayonet designed for mounting on rifles, while also serving as a standalone combat and utility knife. Its serrated edge, sturdy design, and ability to function as a wire cutter make it a highly adaptable tool in both combat and survival situations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Mutant Pelt Quality: %c[ui_gray_2]65% - 85%
OTs-4 Combat Knife

A tactical military knife designed for durability and effectiveness in hand-to-hand combat. Featuring a sharp, reinforced blade, it is built for both utility and close-quarters engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Field Dressing Mutants

Monolith Blade

A distinctively curved blade known for its powerful chopping ability, traditionally used as both a tool and a weapon. Its weighted forward design makes it highly effective for cutting, making it a staple in survival, combat, and utility applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Kukri

A distinctively curved blade known for its powerful chopping ability, traditionally used as both a tool and a weapon. Its weighted forward design makes it highly effective for cutting, making it a staple in survival, combat, and utility applications.

Gerber Tomahawk

A modern tactical tool designed for breaching, close combat, and survival applications, featuring a sharp axe head and a sturdy spike for versatility. Its durable construction and ergonomic grip make it a reliable choice for military, law enforcement, and outdoor use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]90

Hunting Axe

A compact, sharp-edged tool designed for chopping wood, processing game, and general survival use. Its sturdy handle and balanced weight make it an essential companion for outdoor expeditions and wilderness survival.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]120

Sledgehammer

A heavy, two-handed striking tool designed for powerful impact, often used for demolition, breaching, and melee combat in extreme situations. Its massive weight and solid construction allow it to break through obstacles, making it a formidable weapon or tool in survival and tactical scenarios.
